name: Hard Starts #2
description:
Another session that adds an element of race specificity with high-intensity efforts. The main set of intervals consists of repeated anaerobic efforts, followed by a sustained period at and above threshold. 



Much like a road race, you will be required to produce high power with slight recovery.
